success.title: Invitation Accepted
success.message: You are now a member of <1>{{tenantName}}</1> with <3>{{role}}</3> permissions. Click OK to be taken to <5>{{tenantName}}</5>.

notFound.title: Invitation Not Found
notFound.message: The invitation you requested could not be found. Please re-check the email that was sent to you and try again.

conflict.title: Failed to Accept Invitation
conflict.message: Unable to accept Tenant Invitation because you are already a member of <1>{{tenantName}}</1> with <3>{{role}}</3> permissions. Click OK to be taken to <5>{{tenantName}}</5>.
